Content.Text:
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>, what's up?
Give her the chocolate pudding.
Don't give it to her.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
Oh! Chocolate pudding? You really
did remember that promise. Thanks!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was actually just thinking about
taking a break. Come on, let's eat
together!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So delicious! <MYNAME>, you really are a
great cook!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was just trying to think of some new
magic tricks, but I got a bit stumped.
<PAGE>
So, this really lifted my spirits.
Thanks so much, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, so you want to know what kind of
trick I was trying to come up with?
<PAGE>
I'm afraid I can't tell you that.
<PAGE>
If the secret got out, it wouldn't
exactly be magic, now would it?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you really that interested
in my magic?
<PAGE>
If you agree to assist me, I guess I can
teach you at least a few of my tricks.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, so you'll help me. Well then, no
time to lose. Let's go!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
So, for the next show I'm thinking
about a trick where I make a rare
treasure appear out of nowhere.
<PAGE>
But a rare treasure is of course
essential for the trick... and I don't
have one.
<PAGE>
That's where you fit in, <MYNAME>. I want
you to find some rare ore for me.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Is that... too much to ask?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah! You're the best!<RED>∀</RED> In that case,
I'm counting on you!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Hmmm, I don't think this is all that
rare.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
This won't do. It's got to be something
that's rare enough to give everyone a
big surprise.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
As I suspected, it won't be so easy to
find something suitable. We might
just have to give up...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
Huh? You'll definitely find it by my
next show. Really?!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. I'm counting on you!
<PAGE>
Hmm... How about a diamond? Yes, that's
it, a diamond would definitely surprise
everyone!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hehe. I believe you when you say that
you'll find that diamond for me.
I'll be waiting for you, <MYNAME>.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'm sorry.
<PAGE>
I've got to get back to preparing
something that I'll need for my
next magic show.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? What do I need? Um...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I guess I can make an exception
and tell you, <MYNAME>. But remember,
it's our secret, OK?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
A diamond is essential for my next magic
trick.
<PAGE>
Now finding it... that's the problem.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You'll really search for one for
me?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, I'm so happy!<RED>∀</RED> Well then,
I'm counting on you, <MYNAME>!
